title: Cloning
summary: Cloning is the main way of “resurrection” for players.
full_text:
Cloning
Cloning is the main way of “resurrection” for players.
Upon dying in Starscape, you will respawn in a cloning bay and be charged a cloning fee of 500 credits if you have more than 5,000 credits. The default spawnpoint is the cloning bay in the Citadel.
For any faction other than CoreSec, as a tier 3 standing reward you can set your spawnpoint to their capital system for a fee of 1,000 credits. To move your spawnpoint, visit the desired cloning bay and interact with the terminal therein. For military factions, it is on the military station in the faction capital. For industrial factions, it will be found on the commercial station. Cloning bays are exclusive to Core systems.
Cloning Bay Locations

CoreSec
 The Citadel (The Citadel)
Military Factions
 Lycentia (Lycentia Prime)
 Vanos
 Hippa
Industrial Factions
 Harbor (Union Station)
 Syndica (Base Zero)
 Quarry (Headquarters)
